SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! printing the command formed : PRINT "EXECUTING CMD : &UC4RB_RUN_CMD#"
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" "&UC4RB_OSB_DOMAIN_HOME#\bin\setDomainEnv.cmd" &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# : CASE "UNIX" if [ -z != $WEBLOGIC_HOME ] then . $WEBLOGIC_HOME/server/bin/setWLSEnv.sh error=$? export CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-api.jar:$OSB_HOME/modules/com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-impl.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/alsb.jar &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# error=$? else echo "WEBLOGIC_HOME is not set" error=1 fi : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
